title: Announcement, Lines: New Writing Series at the Detroit Institute of Arts, 1986
title_raw: Lines: New Writing Series at the Detroit Institute of Arts
signed: Signature imprinted in blue, left edge, running upward, sideways: Design: Edward Fella
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in blue and yellow across upper left edge: MARCH/ APRIL/ 1986/ LINES:/ NEW/ WRITING/ at The/ DETROIT/ INSTITUTE/ OF ARTS; enclosed in box across upper left quadrant, : L/ SONIA SANCHEZ/ author of/ We a BaddDDD People... [gives biographical information of author, date, time location, admission fee of event]... ADMISSION $3.00; across upper right quadrant, enclosed in box: "Literary Models/ And/ Photography"/ a slide-lecture by/ CARL TOTH...[gives biographical information of author, date, time location, admission fee of event]... ADMISSION $3.00/ i; across center enclosed in a box: N TUESDAY/ APRIL 17/ THE SECOND/ ANNUAL/ LINES/ BENEFIT/ READ...[gives biographical information of authors, date, time location, admission fee of event]... ADMISSION $6.00; enclosed in box across lower left quadrant: E/ Sunday/ April 27/ Farua Z. Bey...[gives biographical information of author, date, time location, admission fee of event]... ADMISSION $1.00; enclosed in box across lower right quadrant: S/ Poetry/ on the/ Radio:/ "DIMENSION"...[gives date, time location, admission fee of event]... FM 102
Verso: Imprinted in blue, enclosed in box, center: Farya Z. Bey/ SUNDAY APRIL 27/ LINES:/ NEW/ WRITING... [gives participating authors, dates, additional information]... JESSICA HAGEDORN; across lower left quadrant: THE DETROIT INSTITUTE OF ARTS/ 5200 Woodward Avenue/ Detroit, Michigan 48202; across lower right quadrant: Non-Profit Organization/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Founders Society/ Detroit Institute of Arts
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in yellow and blue inks for reading, lecture, and discussion series at The Detroit Institute of Arts, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout.    
Recto: Upper left edge, blue and yellow text enclosed in rectangular box giving title, date.  Scattered across sheet, enclosed in five boxes, blue and yellow text giving information for each event.  Each box contains one letter of "Lines."  
Verso: Center, square image, printed in blue, composed of key words from the various LINES events.  Across lower third of sheet, blue text giving mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Lines: New Writing Series at the Detroit Institute of Arts, 1986. Offset lithograph on white paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-37
